alert.note: Alert for Barber; Clark; Comanche; Edwards; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Kiowa; Meade; Pawnee; Pratt; Rush; Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 04 at 2:43AM CST until March 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Fire Weather Danger Friday and Saturday Afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SATURDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 046...064...065... 066...077...078...079...080...081...087...088...089 AND 090... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Fire Weather Watch For wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect Saturday afternoon. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 046 Rush...Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman...Fire Weather Zone 065 Pawnee... Fire Weather Zone 066 Stafford...Fire Weather Zone 077 Gray... Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford...Fire Weather Zone 079 Edwards... Fire Weather Zone 080 Kiowa...Fire Weather Zone 081 Pratt... Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade...Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark... Fire Weather Zone 089 Comanche and Fire Weather Zone 090 Barber. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. Abrupt wind shift to the northwest Saturday afternoon. * Relative Humidity...As low as 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Barber; Clark; Comanche; Edwards; Ford; Gray; Hodgeman; Kiowa; Meade; Pawnee; Pratt; Rush; Stafford
